pkgmetadata.longdescription:
AMD Radeon ProRender Blender is a rendering plugin for Blender.
The plugin product highlights can be found at: https://www.amd.com/en/technologies/radeon-prorender-blender
To see if your GPU is supported see: https://www.amd.com/en/support/kb/release-notes/rn-prorender-blender-v2-3-blender-2-80-2-81-2-82 https://www.amd.com/en/technologies/radeon-prorender-blender#SYSTEM-REQUIREMENTS
GPUs require both OpenCL 1.2 on hardware support and an OpenCL 1.2 driver to use this product. CPUs may require at least SSE2 support.
Rendering may require Vulkan for Full Spectrum Rendering (FSR). You need a Vulkan compatible device and Vulkan driver but will fall back to OpenCL if it doesn't meet requirements. For details see: https://radeon-pro.github.io/RadeonProRenderDocs/plugins/blender/full_spectrum_rendering.html
Using Full setting may be bugged. It unfortunately was the default and an experimental option. Please use a lower setting.
pkgmetadata.use:
Checks for dynamic libraries that may be required to use the denoiser. Checks for OpenCL 1.2 support for Intel CPUs/IGPs/GPUs. Installs the material library. Pulls the required dependencies if Pro support in the AMDGPU-PRO driver has not been installed. Installs the material library.
Checks for OpenCL 1.2 support or Vulkan compatibility for AMDGPU-PRO drivers. Checks for OpenCL 1.2 support or Vulkan compatibility for Intel or IGPs/GPUs. For Gen 7+ users. Checks if the GPU driver is OpenCL 1.2 or Vulkan compatibility. Checks if the GPU driver is OpenCL 1.2 or Vulkan compatibility for Mesa Gallium3D users. Installs dependencies for Vulkan support. Vulkan is used for Full Spectrum Rendering (RPR). Checks if hardware is supported.
